description.narrative: Embassy’s projects/programmes are regularly audited, usually on an annual basis as it is stipulated in the agreements with Sida partner organisations and institutions. Embassy has the responsibility to ensure that the Swedish funding for project/programme activities are used in an appropriate manner and in line with agreed plans. Another important aim of the audit is to safeguard against, prevent and counteract corruption. The regular audits agreed with the cooperation partner are carried out by external, independent and qualified auditors on behalf of the project/programme. In addition to the regular audits, Embassy has the right to commission special and organisational audits, for which the Embassy will be contracting party. The objective of the local audit services are: (1) to assist the Embassy in undertaking the special and organisational audits of projects and programmes in a timely and professional manner in order to safeguard the use of Swedish Government funding, prevent corruption and ensure efficient implementation of projects/programmes; (2) to assist the Embassy with advise about compliance of regular audit reports with agreement requirements; (3) to assist the Embassy in building internal capacity relating to audit activities The conclusion of the tender evaluation dated 18 December 2014, is that “Deloitte” d.o.o. Sarajevo has submitted the most qualified tender for providing the consulting services. The contract with "Deloitte" d.o.o. Sarajevo was signed on 28 January 2015 with the expiration dated 31 July 2016. The contract can be extended twice with unaltered conditions for a period of 12 months each. The contract has been extended until 31 July 2017.

Upphandlingen för denna insatsinleddes 2014 i nära samarbete med Sida Procurement rådgivare. Upphandlingen som tillämpades var öppet anbud. Bidraget var en komponent i programmet utvecklingsfonden (PDF) men på grund av det nya finansiella systemet och dess regler, kommer den komponenten att stängas och ett nytt bidrag skapas i 2016 i PLANit.
